column2: FileSystemUtil: Update JNA code to work on Linux/PPC

column3:
The struct stat64 offsets were incorrect for Linux/PPC32.
Add the correct offsets, and use them when OS_ARCH is "ppc".

Also, increase the "ver" parameter of __xstat64 to "1", since the
Linux/PPC64 libc rejects the value "0".

There might be more arches where the default offset table is incorrect,
but I can't test that right now.

I have tested this patch on Linux/PPC with IBM JDK 1.7.0 (both 32 and 64 bit)
and on Linux/x86 with Oracle JDK 1.7.0 (64 bit).

Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign (mention you github account name there), scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
